meanings.definition: The act of using something in a way that is dishonest or illegal.
meanings.sent1: The misappropriations of company funds led to a serious investigation.
meanings.sent2: The misappropriations of public funds were discovered during the audit.
meanings.sent3: The misappropriations of office supplies for personal use caused quite a stir in the workplace.
meanings.sent4: Her misappropriations of trust shook the foundation of their friendship.
meanings.sent5: The misappropriations of the evidence made the case even more complicated.

meanings.definition: Funds or resources that have been used improperly or for the wrong purpose.
meanings.sent1: The misappropriations of charity donations shocked the community.
meanings.sent2: The misappropriations of school funds were uncovered by the diligent accountant.
meanings.sent3: The misappropriations of snacks from the pantry were a tasty secret.
meanings.sent4: His misappropriations of time left him feeling unfulfilled.
meanings.sent5: The misappropriations of resources left the project in chaos.
